label.windowText: window settings, measurement from the floor to bottom and top of the window covered by the blind
label.windowAngleText: representing the perpendicular of the window to geographical north (in degrees)
label.blindPosOverwriteText: manual overwrite of the blind position
label.sunControlActiveText: Restricting the extent to which direct sunlight may shine into the room

placeholder.blindPosOverwriteExpire: (opt) the duration a manual setting will remain is place
placeholder.blindPosSunNotInWindow: (opt) blind position sun not in window
placeholder.sunFloorLength: (opt) the extent to which direct sunlight is to be allowed into the room through the window, defined as a length on the floor
placeholder.sunMinAltitude: (opt) minimum altitude of the sun for determination of blind position
placeholder.tempThreshold: (opt) temperature at which the blind will be set to the temperature threshold position while the sun is in the window
placeholder.tempBlindPos: 0 (opt) the blind position associated with temperature threshold
placeholder.cloudThreshold: (opt) maximum percentage of sky occluded by clouds
placeholder.cloudBlindPos: 100 (opt) the blind position associated with the clouds threshold
placeholder.name: Name

reasons.overwritePrio: position is overwritten by priority, no expire
reasons.openDef: in default open position (no sun calc)

errors.invalid-propertyStart-type: Invalid Property Type for alternate start: __type__
errors.invalid-propertyEnd-type: Invalid Property Type for alternate end: __type__
errors.invalid-blind-position: Given Blind-Position __pos__ is not a valid Position!
